paper_abstract: The first symposium on Educational Advances in Artificial Intelligence (EAAI) was held in July 2010 in conjunction with the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI-10). It included an invited talk, paper presentations, model AI assignments, a teaching and mentoring workshop, a best educational video award, and a robotics track. This report summarizes. that symposium.
paper_title: EAAI-10: The First Symposium on Educational Advances in Artificial Intelligence
